message: I'm being generous, but I want most of the money.  Accept this and we're done.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This is a fair split considering the inflation working against you.
This is the last offer I'll make that's even close to what I was originally hoping for.  Take it or I'll be forced to be more aggressive next round.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us. Don't let greed get in the way of a fair agreement.
I'm tired of this back and forth.  Let's just split the money evenly and be done with it.
